title: Trooping the colour, 1949
creator_credit: Central Office of Information and Crown Film Unit
brief_description: Presents the ceremony of Trooping the Colour by the Brigade of Horse Guards on the occasion of the King’s birthday, 9th June, 1949. His Majesty, King George VI, and the Duke of Gloucester take part in the ceremony and the then Princess Elizabeth takes the salute at this impressive ceremony.
